item.title: California wants to mix hydrogen with gas to cut climate pollution. Critics say that poses risks
item.description: Blending green hydrogen with natural gas is seen by some as key to achieving Californiaâ€™s clean energy goals

item.title: Mattel adds an autistic Barbie to doll line devoted to diversity and inclusion
item.description: An autistic Barbie is joining Mattel's line of fashion dolls that's intended to celebrate diversity

item.title: Hong Kong court hears arguments on sentencing of former publisher Jimmy Lai; no decision yet
item.description: A Hong Kong court is hearing arguments about the sentencing of democracy advocate Jimmy Lai

item.title: China says it has a deal with the EU on steps to resolve dispute over EV imports
item.description: China and the European Union say they have agreed on steps toward resolving their dispute over the bloc's imports of Chinese-made electric vehicles

item.title: As Canada tries to reduce its dependence on the US, its leader will visit China to rebuild ties
item.description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney is visiting China this week to mend relations with the world's second-largest economy
